20101206140412.000|20101206140413.429|CCO|I THINK IS WAY OVERSTATED.
20101206140413.429|20101206140414.857|CCO|WE LOOKED AT IT VERY, VERY 
20101206140414.857|20101206140416.286|CCO|CAREFULLY, ANALYZED IT EVERY 
20101206140416.286|20101206140417.714|CCO|WHICH WAY.
20101206140417.714|20101206140419.143|CCO|ONE MYTH THAT'S OUT THERE IS 
20101206140419.143|20101206140420.571|CCO|THAT WHAT WE'RE DOING IS 
20101206140420.571|20101206140422.000|CCO|PRINTING MONEY.
20101206140422.000|20101206140423.667|CCO|WE'RE NOT PRINTING MONEY.

20101206140425.333|20101206140427.000|CCO|CIRCULATION IS NOT CHANGING.

20101206140445.333|20101206140447.000|CCO|>> THE FED BOSS ALSO SAYS HE 
20101206140447.000|20101206140448.667|CCO|HASN'T RULED OUT EXPANDING THE

20101206140457.000|20101206140459.500|CCO|OUT OF IRAN.
20101206140459.500|20101206140502.000|CCO|IT SAYS IT CAN NOW MAKE NUCLEAR 
20101206140502.000|20101206140503.667|CCO|FUEL FROM SCRATCH INCLUDING A 
20101206140503.667|20101206140505.333|CCO|CRUCIAL COMPONENT KNOWN AS 
20101206140505.333|20101206140507.000|CCO|YELLOW CAKE.
20101206140507.000|20101206140508.667|CCO|IT'S A COARSE POWDER.
20101206140508.667|20101206140510.333|CCO|MAKING IT IS THE FIRST STEP 18 
20101206140510.333|20101206140512.000|CCO|PROCESS THAT CONVERTS URANIUM 
20101206140512.000|20101206140514.000|CCO|INTO ONE OF TWO THINGS.
20101206140514.000|20101206140516.000|CCO|FUEL FOR A NUCLEAR POWER 
20101206140516.000|20101206140518.000|CCO|REACTOR, OR THE METAL USED IN AN
20101206140518.000|20101206140520.000|CCO|ATOMIC WEAPON.
20101206140520.000|20101206140522.000|CCO|THAT HAS THE WHITE HOUSE PRETTY 
20101206140522.000|20101206140523.250|CCO|WORRIED.
20101206140523.250|20101206140524.500|CCO|UNTIL NOW IRAN HAS HAD TO DEPEND

20101206140525.750|20101206140527.000|CCO|MATERIAL.
20101206140527.000|20101206140528.250|CCO|THIS COMES JUST AS LONG DELAYED 
20101206140528.250|20101206140529.500|CCO|NUCLEAR TALKS GET UNDER WAY IN 
20101206140529.500|20101206140530.750|CCO|SWITZERLAND TODAY.
20101206140530.750|20101206140532.000|CCO|GOOGLING YOURSELF, EVERYBODY 
20101206140532.000|20101206140534.000|CCO|DOES IT, RIGHT, EVEN CHINESE 
20101206140534.000|20101206140536.000|CCO|LEADERS.
20101206140536.000|20101206140538.000|CCO|WHEN ONE HIGHER UP TYPED IN HIS 
20101206140538.000|20101206140540.000|CCO|NAME AND THAT SEARCH ENGINE AND 
20101206140540.000|20101206140542.000|CCO|FOUND SOME LESS THAN FLATTERING 
20101206140542.000|20101206140544.500|CCO|POSTS HE TURNED UP THE HEAT ON 
20101206140544.500|20101206140547.000|CCO|GOOGLE TO SENSOR ITS MATERIAL.
20101206140547.000|20101206140549.500|CCO|THAT'S ACCORDING TO A NEW 
20101206140549.500|20101206140552.000|CCO|WIKILEAKS CABLE.
20101206140552.000|20101206140553.250|CCO|DEB, GOOGLE AND CHINA HAVE A 
20101206140553.250|20101206140554.500|CCO|ROCKY RELATIONSHIP FOR YEARS 
20101206140554.500|20101206140555.750|CCO|ABOUT THUT TAKES IT TO AN 
20101206140555.750|20101206140557.000|CCO|INTERESTING LEVEL.
20101206140557.000|20101206140558.250|CCO|>> Reporter: IT DOES.
20101206140558.250|20101206140559.500|CCO|IT SHEDS A LOT OF LIGHT ON WHAT 
20101206140559.500|20101206140600.750|CCO|WAS REALLY GOING ON.
20101206140600.750|20101206140602.000|CCO|CHINA FELT THREATENED BY THE 
20101206140602.000|20101206140604.000|CCO|KIND OF INFORMATION THAT GOOGLE 
20101206140604.000|20101206140606.000|CCO|WAS PROVIDING, SPECIFICALLY EVEN
20101206140606.000|20101206140608.000|CCO|THOUGH GOOGLE AGREED TO SENSOR 
20101206140608.000|20101206140610.000|CCO|SOME OF THE MATERIAL NOW PUT 
20101206140610.000|20101206140612.000|CCO|EVERYTHING ON IT ACCORDING TO 
20101206140612.000|20101206140613.667|CCO|CHINESE LAW, WHAT THEY DID WAS A
20101206140613.667|20101206140615.333|CCO|LINK TO GOOGLE.COM, AND ONCE 
20101206140615.333|20101206140617.000|CCO|PEOPLE WERE ON GOOGLE CHINA AS 
20101206140617.000|20101206140618.667|CCO|THEY ACCESSED GOOGLE.COM THEY 
20101206140618.667|20101206140620.333|CCO|GOT ACCESS TO A LOT MORE 
20101206140620.333|20101206140622.000|CCO|INFORMATION.
20101206140622.000|20101206140624.000|CCO|THAT MADE THE CHINESE GOVERNMENT
20101206140624.000|20101206140626.000|CCO|VERY NERVOUS AND THEY HAD TO PUT
20101206140626.000|20101206140628.000|CCO|PRESSURE ON GOOGLE TO TAKE IT 
20101206140628.000|20101206140630.000|CCO|DOWN, TO FILTER THE FLOW OF 
20101206140630.000|20101206140632.000|CCO|INFORMATION.
20101206140632.000|20101206140633.667|CCO|GOOGLE STOOD UP TO CHINA, THE 
20101206140633.667|20101206140635.333|CCO|FIRST TIME THE CHINESE VERY SORT
20101206140635.333|20101206140637.000|CCO|OF TAKEN ABACK BY THE FACT THAT 
20101206140637.000|20101206140638.667|CCO|THEY WERE BEING DEFIED BY GOOGLE

20101206140642.000|20101206140644.000|CCO|THEMSELVES TO BE TO

20101206140646.000|20101206140648.000|CCO|GOOGLE WAS THE ONLY SEARCH 
20101206140648.000|20101206140650.000|CCO|ENGINE IN CHINA AT THE TIME.
20101206140650.000|20101206140652.000|CCO|THE ATTACKS SHOW THAT THE MOVE 
20101206140652.000|20101206140654.500|CCO|TO TRY TO TAKE DOWN THE GOOGLE 
20101206140654.500|20101206140657.000|CCO|SITE WAS IN FACT POLITICAL, IT 
20101206140657.000|20101206140659.500|CCO|WAS NOT BUSINESS MOTIVATED BUT 
20101206140659.500|20101206140702.000|CCO|CHINESE BUSINESSES WERE 
20101206140702.000|20101206140703.429|CCO|THREATENED BY GOVERNMENT 
20101206140703.429|20101206140704.857|CCO|OFFICIALS, SAYING THAT THEY 
20101206140704.857|20101206140706.286|CCO|NEEDED TO STOP DOING BUSINESS 
20101206140706.286|20101206140707.714|CCO|WITH GOOGLE.
20101206140707.714|20101206140709.143|CCO|THAT'S THE KIND OF PRESSURE THAT
20101206140709.143|20101206140710.571|CCO|GOOGLE WAS UNDER WHILE ALL OF 
20101206140710.571|20101206140712.000|CCO|THIS WAS GOING ON.
20101206140712.000|20101206140713.429|CCO|IT WAS INTERESTING AND WE HAVE A
20101206140713.429|20101206140714.857|CCO|QUOTE FROM ONE OF THOSE 
20101206140714.857|20101206140716.286|CCO|WIKILEAKS.
20101206140716.286|20101206140717.714|CCO|IT SAYS GOOGLE'S REEBT MOVE 
20101206140717.714|20101206140719.143|CCO|PRESENTED A MAJOR DILEMMA FOR 
20101206140719.143|20101206140720.571|CCO|THE CHINESE GOVERNMENT NOT 
20101206140720.571|20101206140722.000|CCO|BECAUSE OF THE CYBER SECURITY 
20101206140722.000|20101206140723.667|CCO|ASPECT BUT BECAUSE EVER GOOGLE'S
20101206140723.667|20101206140725.333|CCO|DIRECT CHALLENGE TO CHINA'S 
20101206140725.333|20101206140727.000|CCO|LEGAL RESTRICTIONS ON INTERNET 
20101206140727.000|20101206140728.667|CCO|CONTENT.
20101206140728.667|20101206140730.333|CCO|ANOTHER THING THAT WAS 
20101206140730.333|20101206140732.000|CCO|INTERESTING ACCORDING TO THE
